casebody.data:
F. C. CASTELLI COMPANY v. Herman KESLER and American Metal Specialties Corporation, Appellants. No. 9413. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 9, 1947. Decided Oct. 20, 1947. A. Caesar, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Caesar & Rivise and LeRoy Comanor, both of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellants. Joseph G. Denny, Jr., of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, ALBERT LEE STEPHENS and MARIS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the court below is affirmed.
